text: In the third year of King Cyrus of Persia a message was revealed to Daniel (who was also called Belteshazzar). This message was true and concerned a great war. He understood the message and gained insight by the vision.
In those days I, Daniel, was mourning for three whole weeks.
I ate no choice food, no meat or wine came to my lips, nor did I anoint myself with oil until the end of those three weeks.
On the twenty-fourth day of the first month I was beside the great river, the Tigris.

I <st data-num="05375 05869">looked up</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="07200 02009">saw</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">a</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="03847" class="">clothed</st> in <st data-num="0906" class="">linen</st>;<n id="4" /> around his <st data-num="04975" class="">waist</st> <st data-num="02296" class="">was a belt</st> made of <st data-num="03800" class="">gold</st> from <st data-num="0210" class="">Ufaz</st>.<n id="5" />

His body resembled yellow jasper, and his face had an appearance like lightning. His eyes were like blazing torches; his arms and feet had the gleam of polished bronze. His voice thundered forth like the sound of a large crowd.
Only I, Daniel, saw the vision; the men who were with me did not see it. On the contrary, they were overcome with fright and ran away to hide.

<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">alone</st> was <st data-num="07604" class="">left</st> to <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="04759" class="">vision</st>. My <st data-num="03581" class="">strength</st> <st data-num="03808 07604">drained</st> from<n id="1" /> me, and my <st data-num="01935" class="">vigor</st> <st data-num="02015 05921 04889">disappeared</st>;<n id="2" /> I <st data-num="06113" class="">was</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">without</st> <st data-num="03581" class="">energy</st>.<n id="3" />

I <st data-num="08085" class="">listened to</st> his <st data-num="06963 01697">voice</st>,<n id="1" /> and as I <st data-num="08085" class="">did</st> <st data-num="06963 01697">so</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="07290" class="">into a trance-like sleep</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st> my <st data-num="06440 06440">face</st> to the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st>.

<st data-num="02009" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="05060" class="">touched</st> me and <st data-num="05128" class="">set</st> me <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> my <st data-num="03709 03027">hands</st> and <st data-num="01290" class="">knees</st>.<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me, “<st data-num="01840" class="">Daniel</st>, <st data-num="0376" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="02530" class="">of great value</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0995" class="">Understand</st> the <st data-num="01697" class="">words</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am about to<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01696" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you. So <st data-num="05975" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="05921 05975">up</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> I have <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st> been <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you.” When he <st data-num="01696" class="">said</st> <st data-num="01697 02088">this</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="05973" class="">to</st> me, I <st data-num="05975" class="">stood up</st> <st data-num="07460" class="">shaking</st>.

Then he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me, “<st data-num="0408" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">be afraid</st>, <st data-num="01840" class="">Daniel</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the very <st data-num="07223" class="">first</st> <st data-num="03117 0834">day</st> you <st data-num="05414" class="">applied</st> your <st data-num="03820" class="">mind</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="0995" class="">understand</st> and to <st data-num="06031" class="">humble</st> yourself <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> your <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, your <st data-num="01697" class="">words</st> were <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st>. <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> in response to your <st data-num="01697" class="">words</st>.

However, the <st data-num="08269" class="">prince</st> of the <st data-num="04438" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="06539" class="">Persia</st> was <st data-num="05975 05048">opposing</st> me for <st data-num="06242 0259" class="">21</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>. <st data-num="02009" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04317" class="">Michael</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="07223" class="">leading</st> <st data-num="08269" class="">princes</st>, <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="05826" class="">help</st> me, because <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> was <st data-num="03498" class="">left</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0681" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of <st data-num="06539" class="">Persia</st>.
Now I have come to help you understand what will happen to your people in future days, for the vision pertains to days to come.”
While he was saying this to me, I was flat on the ground and unable to speak.

<st data-num="02009" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> one who <st data-num="01823" class="">appeared to be</st> a <st data-num="0120" class="">human</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">being</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="05060 05921">touching</st> my <st data-num="08193" class="">lips</st>. I <st data-num="06605" class="">opened</st> my <st data-num="06310" class="">mouth</st> and started to <st data-num="01696" class="">speak</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the one who was <st data-num="05975" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="05048" class="">before</st> me, “<st data-num="0113" class="">Sir</st>,<n id="3" /> due to the <st data-num="04759" class="">vision</st>, <st data-num="06735" class="">anxiety</st> has <st data-num="02015 05921">gripped</st> me and I <st data-num="06113" class="">have</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="03581" class="">strength</st>.

<st data-num="01963" class="">How</st>, <st data-num="0113 02088">sir</st>, <st data-num="03201" class="">am</st> <st data-num="05650" class="">I</st> <st data-num="03201" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="01696" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0113 02088">you</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0589" class="">My</st> <st data-num="03581" class="">strength</st> <st data-num="06258" class="">is</st> <st data-num="03808 05975">gone</st>,<n id="2" /> and I <st data-num="07604" class="">am</st> <st data-num="05397 03808">breathless</st>.”

Then the one who <st data-num="04758" class="">appeared to be</st> a <st data-num="0120" class="">human being</st> <st data-num="05060" class="">touched</st> me <st data-num="03254" class="">again</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02388" class="">strengthened</st> me.

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to me, “<st data-num="0408" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">be afraid</st>, <st data-num="0376" class="">you</st> who are <st data-num="02530" class="">highly valued</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07965" class="">Peace</st> be to you! <st data-num="02388" class="">Be strong</st>! <st data-num="02388" class="">Be</st> really <st data-num="02388" class="">strong</st>!” When he <st data-num="01696" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">to</st> me, I was <st data-num="02388" class="">strengthened</st>. I <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="0113" class="">Sir</st>, you may <st data-num="01696" class="">speak</st> now,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> you have <st data-num="02388" class="">given</st> me <st data-num="02388" class="">strength</st>.”

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “Do you <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="04100" class="">why</st> I have <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> I am about to <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st> to <st data-num="03898" class="">engage in battle</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="08269" class="">prince</st> of <st data-num="06539" class="">Persia</st>. <st data-num="02009" class="">When</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">go</st>, the <st data-num="08269" class="">prince</st> of <st data-num="03120" class="">Greece</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">is coming</st>.
However, I will first tell you what is written in a dependable book. (There is no one who strengthens me against these princes, except Michael your prince.
